title: How to execute the programs of the dataset using the simulator?
body:
Hi, 

I am also trying to use the scripts from the executable_programs to generate my own dataset, using version v1.0.0 of the simulator.


My current setting:
- executable program:
   executable_programs/TrimmedTestScene1_graph/results_text_rebuttal_specialparsed_programs_turk_july/split3_2.txt: 
  ```
  Dry soap bottles
  Go to the shower or bath. Locate bottles of soap or shampoo. Pick up each bottle and, using a towel, dry off the bottle. Return each bottle to its original location.
  
  
  [FIND] <towel> (1.1000)
  [FIND] <vacuum_cleaner> (1.1001)
  [GRAB] <vacuum_cleaner> (1.1001)
  [FIND] <soap> (1.1002)
  [WIPE] <soap> (1.1002)
  [GRAB] <soap> (1.1002)
  [PUTOBJBACK] <soap> (1.1002)
  [FIND] <shampoo> (1.1003)
  [GRAB] <shampoo> (1.1003)
  [WIPE] <shampoo> (1.1003)
  [PUTOBJBACK] <shampoo> (1.1003)
  [FIND] <shampoo> (2.1004)
  [GRAB] <shampoo> (2.1004)
  [WIPE] <shampoo> (2.1004)
  [PUTOBJBACK] <shampoo> (2.1004)
    ```
- init_graph :
  init_and_final_graphs/TrimmedTestScene1_graph/results_text_rebuttal_specialparsed_programs_turk_july/split3_2.json



My code used to expand the scene:
```
comm.reset(graph_id - 1)
with open('init_and_final_graph/{}'.format(graph_file), 'r') as f:
    graphs = json.load(f)
    first_graph = graphs['init_graph']
comm.expand_scene(first_graph)
```


The expand_scene() function returned:
```
 (False,
 {'missing_prefabs': ['vacuumcleaner', 'microphone', 'laundrydetergent'],
  'unplaced': ['vacuumcleaner', 'microphone', 'laundrydetergent']})
```


Notice that **the <vacuum_cleaner> in the program is still unplaced.**

Can anyone please advise on how to fix this?
